properties.name: moreea.security.accesstoken
properties.description: Access token, which length should be greater or equal to 32 characters. You should keep it safe, because leak of that value can be critical.

properties.name: moreea.code.length
properties.description: Length of the generated verification code.

properties.name: moreea.code.interval
properties.description: Interval between the separators in the verification code.
